Title: Tideland
Writer: Tony Grisoni (screenplay), Terry Gilliam (screenplay), Mitch Cullin (novel)
Actors: Jodelle Ferland, Janet McTeer, Brendan Fletcher, Jennifer Tilly
Plot: Pre-teen Jeliza-Rose's parents are hopeless drug addicts. When pa, rocker Noah, finds ma's OD'd, he fears to be charged with homicide and takes Jeliza along to his ma's place, in a desolate country region. With Noah passed out, the girl mentally transfers to a fantasy world she and her doll heads enter magically. Jeliza's adventures also star the crazy locals, notably Dell, and Dell's grown but intellectually disabled brother Dickens.
Production: Recorded Pictures Company, Capri Films, HanWay Films
